Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7347 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-12
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7347 affecting package nginx for versions less than 1.22.1-12. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package nginx is earlier than 1.22.1-12, affected by CVE-2024-7347
